alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 07 at 3:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Pima and west central Cochise Counties through 430 PM MST... At 344 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster os strong thunderstorms near St. David, or near Benson, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. pea size hail, heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benson, St. David, Kartchner Caverns State Park and Mescal. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 294 and 310. Route 80 between mile markers 293 and 304. Route 90 between mile markers 290 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
